title: A New Forest Witch
description: Nan's father is dead. Her world turned upside down. All she has left are ghosts from the past and a trunk full of secrets. Determined to uncover the truth behind her family's lies she travels to England, but what she finds there is not what she expected. With a centuries-old murderer now hot on her trail, Nan must lay her future in the hands of a coven of Celtic witches before she joins her ancestors in the grave.
author: Siobhan Searle
